header.title: Elections Aside, What Should Our Political Focus and Priorities Be?

title: Elections Aside, What Should Our Political Focus and Priorities Be?
content:
With midterm elections upon us, the nation’s focus is even more dissipated than usual, driven by polls, regional... <!--more--> contests, high-profile personalities and hot-button public-policy issues various media outlets are championing.
In this dizzying political atmosphere, it’s easy to lose sight of what our political focus and priorities should be.
Leid Stories, therefore, engages in that discussion today, asking listeners to define (or redefine) the elements of a progressive political agenda, election season notwithstanding, and what informs their views.
